snippet: In South Carolina, Mitt Romney admits that "amber waves of grain" in the song "America the Beautiful" don't include corn.
abstract: In South Carolina, Mitt Romney admits that "amber waves of grain" in the song "America the Beautiful" don't include corn.
lead_paragraph: In Iowa earlier this week, Mitt Romney was guilty of an outrageous falsehood: He said that the "amber waves of grain" in the song "America the Beautiful" include corn.
